description.0: A polearm that appears to have been crafted from a metal agricultural tool. At first glance, it could not look more ordinary, yet its discreet design hides fittings that are both lavish and undeniably exquisite.

0.0: Electro-Charged DMG is increased by <cryo>48%</cryo>, and Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by <cryo>12%</cryo>. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by an additional <cryo>12%</cryo>.

1.0: Electro-Charged DMG is increased by <cryo>60%</cryo>, and Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by <cryo>15%</cryo>. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by an additional <cryo>15%</cryo>.

2.0: Electro-Charged DMG is increased by <cryo>72%</cryo>, and Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by <cryo>18%</cryo>. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by an additional <cryo>18%</cryo>.

3.0: Electro-Charged DMG is increased by <cryo>84%</cryo>, and Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by <cryo>21%</cryo>. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by an additional <cryo>21%</cryo>.

4.0: Electro-Charged DMG is increased by <cryo>96%</cryo>, and Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by <cryo>24%</cryo>. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by an additional <cryo>24%</cryo>.
